scripts.build:dev: pnpm --filter ui-kit build && pnpm turbo run build --parallel --filter api --filter web...
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run --filter ui-kit build && pnpm run --parallel --filter api --filter web build
scripts.docker:build: docker build -f infra/web.Dockerfile -t okey-web:local . && docker build -f infra/api.Dockerfile -t okey-api:local .
scripts.start:dev: read -p 'Continue with install? (y/n): ' yn && [ "$yn" = "y" ] && pnpm install && read -p 'Continue with build? (y/n): ' yn && [ "$yn" = "y" ] && pnpm run build:dev && read -p 'Continue with dev? (y/n): ' yn && [ "$yn" = "y" ] && pnpm run dev
scripts.start:prod: read -p 'Continue with install? (y/n): ' yn && [ "$yn" = "y" ] && pnpm install -prod && read -p 'Continue with build? (y/n): ' yn && [ "$yn" = "y" ] && pnpm run build:prod && read -p 'Continue with prod? (y/n): ' yn && [ "$yn" = "y" ] && pnpm run prod
